original_title: 6.6 magnitude earthquake near in Nicobar Island
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – There was no tsunami threat to the Indian Ocean from a 6.6 magnitude earthquake near Nicobar Islands, a bulletin issued by Indian authorities said, shortly after the first alert that the quake was big enough to generate a wave.
“Based on pre-run model scenarios, there is NO THREAT to countries in the Indian Ocean,” the notice said.
“No further bulletins will be issued unless the situation changes.”
This bulletin applies to areas within and bordering the Indian Ocean
and is issued by Tsunami Service Provider INDIA in support of the
